text: Vaesite (NiS2) is a mineral found together with cattierite in the Democratic Republic of Congo. It is named after Johannes F. Vaes, a Belgian mineralologist. ==References== *Mindat.org - Vaesite *Webmineral.com - Vaesite *Handbook of Mineralogy - Vaesite Category:Nickel minerals Category:Pyrite group Category:Cubic minerals
title: Vaesite
